item.description:
Calling all our bowlers...

Join Have Fun, Will Travel at Spare Time Bristol for a great evening of Bowling and New Friends

UNLIMITED Galactic Bowling from 7 pm to 11pm
Shoes, Soda, and Snacks are included!

After 11pm - We Move Next Door To City Sports Grille For Food, Drink, and Music

Spare Time Bristol
177 Farmington Ave
(Route 6) Bristol, CT 06010

84 to Route 6 West exit 38
Straight on Route 6 for 8.3 miles
Spare Time is on your Right

Advance Tickets are only $10
Tickets at the event are $15


Just a note...if you are planning to attend the Galactic Bowling event next Wednesday evening, you can go to the www.centralCTsingles.com website and click pay. You can pay online in that manner.

Remember, if you pay in advance, it is only $10.00, otherwise the charge is $15.00 at the door. Pay early to save money! Please do not send checks to me as I do not have the tickets. They are available online.


SPACE IS LIMITED - RESERVE YOUR SPOT TODAY
item.name: Galactic Bowling Nite With Have Fun, Will Travel !!!
